I've gotten pretty far in the game now (lvl 65, Underground City/Grand 
Palace), and I will say if anything, SAVE FREQUENTLY. This app will crash 
often for no reason. The only saving grace is the auto-save feature built 
in that has saved my data right before the game froze or restarted (I think 
auto-save is triggered by entering a new room). Secret of Mana is an 
amazing game, but this port has way too many bugs for me to give it a 
decent rating. Worst of all, there is NO CLOUD SAVE. So if you switch to a 
new phone, too bad. You have to start over. Amazing game (5 stars), but 
very frustrating gameplay (2 stars). Edited to add: For those stuck at the 
desert area after getting Salamando, try going into the inn and saving 
first (without sleeping). I also got stuck but it took a few tries to get 
the game not to crash at Kakkara. I had to make sure none of my characters 
had an active fire sabre. Because sleeping with the fire elemental made the 
game crash. Like I said, I made it to the Underground City, so the game is 
playable if you can get unstuck and past the desert. Maybe a combination of 
things equipped, levels, elementals, etc make the game crash at that spot. 
Keep trying different things.

There is a bug that I have hit 3 times. In the Water Palace area in front of Undine's cave, the D-Pad will get stuck on the left outside the gameplay area. The only solution I have found is to close it and reopen it. Maybe others have hit this bug and found a better solution? Luckily autosave prevents me from losing too much progress but this bug does not exist on the iPhone version. On the other hand, the iPhone version has leafy decorative borders while the Android version just has black bars, I wonder if the bug is related to the lack of borders.   I give this game 5 stars because it is a great game, because the improvements are worthwhile and because I know this bug will eventually get fixed.
